thread.title: Tyson Heck
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Tyson Heck

author: Tyson Heck
title: Tyson Heck
text: At first I had questions about the package deals, and they were a bit difficult to reach. I marked it up to the end of the week and late in the day. Monday rolled around and they contacted me from the message I left answering all my questions and adding great advise. Thank you so much for making the purchase and installation so easy!
